title: Cafe MoMo
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Organic, Western, Buffet, Beer/Wine, Take-out, German, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. With eclectic vintage furniture and china and earthen tones on the walls, this cafe also connects to an art gallery. Open kitchen and offers breakfast and lunch with vegan choices. Has soy milk for coffee and hot chocolate. The apple tart is vegan. On Monday and Thursday the lunch menu is all vegan with greater variety of vegan cakes. On Saturday there's a breakfast buffet in the art gallery with vegan spreads, salads, and usually a kind of vegan pie or bean burger.
